WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

Trying out FluentData and I really like it. But I have one problem. When executing a query with a list of parameters (in operation) I get the following exception:

"{"Must declare the scalar variable \"@0\".}"

The code I use is the one from your example page (using a different table of course):

List<int> ids = new List<int>() { 1, 2, 3, 4 };

dynamic products = Context.Sql(@"select * from Product where ProductId in(@0)", ids).QueryMany<dynamic>();

/Anders

Comments.Message: What database system do you use?
